content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *firenze set is a scarf and cloche crocheted in foliage and adorned with dozens of dimensional flowers berroco * coordinating hat 1 skill level easy materials berroco foliage 50 grs 5 balls #5981 cinnabar and 1 ball each #5922 oleander and #5930 russian sage for **scarf** crochet hooks sizes 5 50 mm i and 7 00 mm l or size to obtain gauge gauge 6 treble_crochet and 6 chain-2 spaces = 4 with size 5 50 mm i crochet hook assembly diagram is provided flower a make 2 oleander and 2 russian sage flower b make 2 russian sage flower c make 8 russian sage and 8 oleander flower d make 8 russian sage and 12 oleander 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/firenze-hat
